title: soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds, Noise Blocking Earbuds for Sleep, Comfortable Fit, Bluetooth 5.2, App, for Unlimited Sleep Sounds, Sleep Monitor, Personal Alarm, Side Sleeper
descriptions:
Here is a product listing based on the provided JSON data summaries:

**soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds**

**Comfortable Sleep, Every Night**

Say goodbye to restless nights and hello to a deeper, more refreshing sleep with the soundcore Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds. Designed specifically for side sleepers, these earbuds provide a comfortable, snug fit that won't protrude or disturb your sleep.

**4-Point Noise Masking System**

Our innovative noise-blocking system ensures that you sleep undisturbed, even in the noisiest of environments. The system features:

* Ear wings for a secure seal
* Twin Seal ear tips for added comfort and noise isolation
* Smart volume control, which adjusts the volume of your sleep sounds to mask external noise

**Immersive Sleep Sounds**

Experience a wide range of soothing sleep sounds through the soundcore app, which integrates seamlessly with your earbuds. Our customized dynamic drivers produce enhanced low-frequency sounds, 10dB lower than standard ones, to help you relax and fall asleep faster.

**Smart Sleep Management**

Take control of your sleep with our advanced sleep management features:

* Sleep monitor: Track your sleep duration and quality, and receive feedback to improve your sleep
* Automatic pause audio: No more disturbing others - the audio pauses automatically when you fall asleep
* Personal alarm: Wake up at your desired time without disturbing others

**Technical Specifications**

* Bluetooth version: 5.2
* App integration: soundcore app for iOS and Android
* Comfortable and lightweight design, perfect for indoor use

**Order now and start sleeping better, tonight!**

Here is a product listing based on the provided JSON data summaries:

**Product Title:** soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds

**Product Description:**

Get a restful night's sleep with the soundcore by Anker, Sleep A10 Bluetooth Sleep Earbuds. Designed specifically for side sleepers, these earbuds provide a comfortable, snug fit without protruding, making them perfect for all-night use. The slim and lightweight design ensures a peaceful sleep, even for those who prefer to sleep on their side.

**Noise Blocking System:**

The Sleep A10 earbuds feature a 4-Point Noise Masking System, which includes ear wings and Twin Seal ear tips for a secure seal. This system, combined with smart volume control, adjusts the sleep sounds' volume to mask external noise, ensuring a more peaceful sleep.

**Bluetooth and App Integration:**

These earbuds feature Bluetooth 5.2 for a reliable connection and seamless pairing. The soundcore app offers a variety of white noise and soothing sleep sounds, allowing you to customize your sleep experience. Plus, the app provides unlimited sleep sounds to help you drift off to dreamland.

**Customized Sleep Sounds:**

The Sleep A10 earbuds boast customized dynamic drivers that produce enhanced low-frequency sounds, 10dB lower than standard ones. This means you'll enjoy a more immersive and effective sleep experience.

**Sleep Management:**

The earbuds come equipped with a sleep monitor that tracks your sleep status and provides valuable feedback on sleep duration and quality. The audio pause feature automatically stops the audio when you fall asleep, and the personal alarm allows you to set a wake-up time without disturbing others.

**Key Features:**

* Comfortable and snug fit for side sleepers
* 4-Point Noise Masking System with ear wings and Twin Seal ear tips
* Bluetooth 5.2 for reliable connection
* soundcore app integration for unlimited sleep sounds
* Customized dynamic drivers for enhanced low-frequency sounds
* Sleep monitor with feedback on sleep duration and quality
* Automatic audio pause when asleep
* Personal alarm for waking up without disturbing others

**Recommended Use:**

Indoor use recommended for peak performance. Not suitable for outdoor use.

**Order now and start sleeping better tonight!**
